title: OCE downloading the game doesnt work

embed.description: Download the game and run the League of Legends installer to continue!

body: well ive been trying to download the game on my pc for a while now and well it doesnt work i have to download it from another server then change the server. anyone else with this issue? perhaps if youre reinstalling? comes up as DOWNLOAD FAILED

replies.body:
>well it doesnt work

What exactly happens? Does your web-browser claim the page to not exist?

You can try [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) temporarily to download the installer. Might want to keep it switched to avoid future problems, though.

i use it on google chrome and what happens is. the download thing normally shows up at the bottom like it normally should. but the thing downloads in the browser and next to it. it says "download failed"

You sure you're downloading from [this page](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)?

You've tried more than once, I presume. Can you check your browser's setting in regards to downloads, and **where they are stored?** The download might be failing because it's attempting to place the file in an illegal location. Could you try using a different browser?
